synopsis.text: Neo Japan's Domon Kasshu, armed with his Shining Gundam, is set to compete in the prestigious Gundam Fight tournament in the year Future Century 60. The tournament, held every four years, determines the ruler of the space colonies that now house most of humanity after Earth's pollution became unbearable. But Domon's participation in the tournament is not just about winning. He has a secret mission: to find and destroy the dangerous Devil Gundam, a weapon of mass destruction that escaped from Neo Japan and threatens to annihilate the entire planet. As he competes against representatives from other colonies, Domon's journey is filled with unexpected alliances, bitter rivalries, and shocking betrayals. Will he be able to clear his family name and save the galaxy from impending doom? The battle for power, glory, and the fate of mankind begins now!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
